basic_info.name: Facts & Figures of AVC College of Engineering:
Why to Join AVC College of Engineering?

Section.name: About AVCCE
Section.description:
AVC College of Engineering was established in the year 1996 in the Nagpattnam district of Tamil Nadu with a mission to become the center of technical and academic excellence. It is currently managed by A V charities which have been working towards imparting the quality education since 1955. The learning modules are directly linked with the R& D department in order to evolve the patterns and make it more students oriented.

1996

Academic Tie Up’s – Association with Strategically sound Organizations for Educational and employment development. The institute has strategic alliance with Center for Research, Anna University for collaborative researches. The college is currently also owning ISO 9001:2008 certification from DNV Neterlands.
Qualified Faculty of 130+ Strength – A team of highly qualified faculty with an expertise than runs into years holding PHDs and Masters profiles from pioneer institutions.
Tie Up’s with Corporate Giants – Major alliances with top MNCs like IBM, Infosys, Wipro, ORACLE, ZENITH, Mphasis, Sapient Technologies, City Union Bank among others to offer the best launch pad to students.
